_AIDE_GENERALE: Remplis ce fichier avec tes infos CS2 et renvoie-le moi ! Les champs avec _AIDE t'expliquent quoi mettre.
_AIDE_id: Ton pseudo en minuscules, sans espaces ni accents. Ex: scream, tonpote, kennyS
_AIDE_pseudo: Ton pseudo in-game tel qu'il s'affiche. Ex: ScreaM, TonPote

_AIDE_nationalite: Ton pays en anglais. Ex: France, Belgium, Morocco, Canada

bio: Ulysse "Rayasticot" Paparazzi is a playful rifler who loves to troll opponents and is notorious for pulling out the Revolver on hostage maps. His unpredictable decisions and cheeky plays keep enemies guessing, and while his style is mischievous, his timing and aim often turn risky Revolver attempts into match-defining moments. Rayasticot is a crowd-pleaser on hostage scenarios â€” chaotic, fun, and surprisingly effective.
